mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1164 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,SML_QTNUM ,SML_QTSER ,ERDAT ,ERZET ,ERNAM ,AEDAT ,AEZET ,AENAM ) VALUES ( #{mandt} ,#{qtnum} ,#{qtser} ,#{smlqtnum} ,#{smlqtser} ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) )

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1046 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTDAT ,AUART ,SPART ,QTGBN ,ZBDTYP ,ZPRGFLG ,VKBUR ,VKGRP ,ZKUNNR ,ZAGNT ,KUNNR ,ZCST ,ZGNM ,ZDEV ,GSNAM ,LAND1 ,ZREGN ,ZLZONE ,REGION ,ZPID ,ZTEL ,ZADDR_ZPOST ,ZADDR_ADR1 ,ZADDR_ADR2 ,SOABLE ,ZESTDAT ,DELDAT ,ZDVMTS ,ZSUM_ZNUMBER ,ZSUM_ZCOST ,ZSUM_ZEAM ,ZSUM_SHANG ,INCO ,INCO2 ,ZDELI ,ZPRINT ,ZICIF_PPRT ,ZICIF_PPCT ,ZICIF_PPCD ,ZICIF_1STRT ,ZICIF_1STCT ,ZICIF_1STCD ,ZICIF_2STRT ,ZICIF_2STCT ,ZICIF_2STCD ,ZICIF_RMRT ,ZICIF_RMCT ,ZICIF_RMCD ,SPRMK1 ,SPRMK2 ,SPRMK3 ,SPRMK4 ,SPRMK5 ,SPRMK6 ,SPRMK7 ,SPRMK8 ,SPRMK9 ,SPRMK10 ,CO_DDVRTQ ,CO_DEPHTQ ,CO_DSSQ ,CO_BCLCDTQ ,CO_CHPITQ ,CO_ASPC ,CO_DSV1 ,CO_DSV1TQ ,CO_DSV2 ,CO_DSV2TQ ,ZSOFLG ,SONNR ,VBELN ,WAERK ,ZAGNTFLG ,FA_BYRGBN ,JGBN ,AQTNUM ,OPPID ,AUTOLP ,UCH_DUTY ,FRCMFCDAT ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ,DDATE ,DTIME ,DUSER ,LIFNRCHK ,ACHDT ,QTVADT ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTDAT ,AUART ,SPART ,QTGBN ,ZBDTYP ,ZPRGFLG ,VKBUR ,VKGRP ,ZKUNNR ,ZAGNT ,KUNNR ,ZCST ,ZGNM ,ZDEV ,GSNAM ,LAND1 ,ZREGN ,ZLZONE ,REGION ,ZPID ,ZTEL ,ZADDR_ZPOST ,ZADDR_ADR1 ,ZADDR_ADR2 ,SOABLE ,ZESTDAT ,DELDAT ,ZDVMTS ,ZSUM_ZNUMBER ,ZSUM_ZCOST ,ZSUM_ZEAM ,ZSUM_SHANG ,INCO ,INCO2 ,ZDELI ,ZPRINT ,ZICIF_PPRT ,ZICIF_PPCT ,ZICIF_PPCD ,ZICIF_1STRT ,ZICIF_1STCT ,ZICIF_1STCD ,ZICIF_2STRT ,ZICIF_2STCT ,ZICIF_2STCD ,ZICIF_RMRT ,ZICIF_RMCT ,ZICIF_RMCD ,SPRMK1 ,SPRMK2 ,SPRMK3 ,SPRMK4 ,SPRMK5 ,SPRMK6 ,SPRMK7 ,SPRMK8 ,SPRMK9 ,SPRMK10 ,CO_DDVRTQ ,CO_DEPHTQ ,CO_DSSQ ,CO_BCLCDTQ ,CO_CHPITQ ,CO_ASPC ,CO_DSV1 ,CO_DSV1TQ ,CO_DSV2 ,CO_DSV2TQ ,ZSOFLG ,SONNR ,VBELN ,WAERK ,ZAGNTFLG ,FA_BYRGBN ,JGBN ,AQTNUM ,OPPID ,AUTOLP ,UCH_DUTY ,FRCMFCDAT ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER ,DDATE ,DTIME ,DUSER ,LIFNRCHK ,ACHDT ,QTVADT FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1046 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1091 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,LH ,CONQTY20 ,CONQTY40 ,ERDAT ,ERZET ,ERNAM ,AEDAT ,AEZET ,AENAM ,EGIS_FLAG ,EGIS_EST_NO ,EGIS_EST_SEQ ,PSPID_CO ,DESTPORT ,DEPTPORT ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,LH ,CONQTY20 ,CONQTY40 ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS ERDAT ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS ERZET ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS ERNAM ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS AEDAT ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS AEZET ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS AENAM ,'' AS EGIS_FLAG ,'' AS EGIS_EST_NO ,0 AS EGIS_EST_SEQ ,PSPID_CO ,DESTPORT ,DEPTPORT FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1091 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1047 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTSEQ ,SHANGH ,ZSAREA ,MATNR ,ZPRDGBN ,SPEC ,GTYPE ,TYPE1 ,TYPE2 ,TYPE3 ,ZNUMBER ,ZACAPA ,ZUSE ,ZOPN ,ZLEN ,ZOUTC ,ZUAM ,ZCOST ,ZCOSTM ,ZEAM ,SHANG ,ZRMK ,SONNR ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ,ZUAMS ,ZURATE ,ZPRGFLG ,INCRTF_TP ,HQMRATE ,BRNDCD ,BRNDSEQ ,FREAMT ,ZCOSTP ,ZUAMP ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTSEQ ,SHANGH ,ZSAREA ,MATNR ,ZPRDGBN ,SPEC ,GTYPE ,TYPE1 ,TYPE2 ,TYPE3 ,ZNUMBER ,ZACAPA ,ZUSE ,ZOPN ,ZLEN ,ZOUTC ,ZUAM ,ZCOST ,ZCOSTM ,ZEAM ,SHANG ,ZRMK ,SONNR ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER ,ZUAMS ,ZURATE ,ZPRGFLG ,INCRTF_TP ,HQMRATE ,BRNDCD ,BRNDSEQ ,FREAMT ,ZCOSTP ,ZUAMP FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1047 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCOBT202 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTSEQ ,BLGRP ,BLSEQ ,BLNUM ,GRMAT ,RQMAT ,TWAER ,MEINH_RQ ,MEINH_MH ,ADJ ,BDMNG ,ZCPMRAW ,ZCPMRAW_A ,ZCPMRAW_T ,ZCPMCOM ,ZCPDLAB ,ZCPDEXP ,ZCPDSCT ,ZCPILAB ,ZCPIMEN ,ZCBIMEN ,ZCPRICE ,ZCTOTAL ,ZACTLAB1 ,ZACTMAC1 ,SANGH ,SALES ,MESSG ,MODEL ,ZYYMM ,CRDAT ,CRNAM ,EDITER ,FLAG ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTSEQ ,BLGRP ,BLSEQ ,BLNUM ,GRMAT ,RQMAT ,TWAER ,MEINH_RQ ,MEINH_MH ,ADJ ,BDMNG ,ZCPMRAW ,ZCPMRAW_A ,ZCPMRAW_T ,ZCPMCOM ,ZCPDLAB ,ZCPDEXP ,ZCPDSCT ,ZCPILAB ,ZCPIMEN ,ZCBIMEN ,ZCPRICE ,ZCTOTAL ,ZACTLAB1 ,ZACTMAC1 ,SANGH ,SALES ,MESSG ,MODEL ,ZYYMM ,CRDAT ,CRNAM ,EDITER ,FLAG FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT202 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1054D ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTSEQ ,PSPID ,POSID ,ATYPE ,GUBUN ,SERIA ,BLSEQ ,BLNUM ,BLNAM ,ZITEM ,ZCHAR ,ZQUTY ,ZAMNT ,ZTOTL ,BIGO ,TEX1 ,TEX2 ,FLAG ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTSEQ ,PSPID ,POSID ,ATYPE ,GUBUN ,SERIA ,BLSEQ ,BLNUM ,BLNAM ,ZITEM ,ZCHAR ,ZQUTY ,ZAMNT ,ZTOTL ,BIGO ,TEX1 ,TEX2 ,FLAG FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1054D WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1050 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTSEQ ,PSPID ,HOGI ,SEQ ,ZCOSTZSEQ ,ZCCD ,ZCGRP ,ZCCT ,ZUAM ,ZUAMS ,WAERK ,ZURATE ,ZCOST ,ZPRCP ,ZPRDI ,ZPRDS ,ZRMK ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTSEQ ,PSPID ,HOGI ,SEQ ,ZCOSTZSEQ ,ZCCD ,ZCGRP ,ZCCT ,ZUAM ,ZUAMS ,WAERK ,ZURATE ,ZCOST ,ZPRCP ,ZPRDI ,ZPRDS ,ZRMK ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1050 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT0713 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTSEQ ,ITM_CODE ,ITM_SEQ ,SPC_CODE ,SPC_COST ,VAL_CODE ,VAL_DESC ,BIGO ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTSEQ ,ITM_CODE ,ITM_SEQ ,SPC_CODE ,SPC_COST ,VAL_CODE ,VAL_DESC ,BIGO ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0713 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT0712 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,QTSEQ ,IG_CODE ,ITM_CODE ,ITM_SEQ ,ZQNTY ,BSCOST ,BIDCOST ,OPCOST ,OIDCOST ,COST ,IDCOST ,BIGO ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,QTSEQ ,IG_CODE ,ITM_CODE ,ITM_SEQ ,ZQNTY ,BSCOST ,BIDCOST ,OPCOST ,OIDCOST ,COST ,IDCOST ,BIGO ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0712 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT0711 ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,STATUS ,CALDAT ,COST ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,CAST(#{smlqtser} AS INTEGER) AS QTSER ,STATUS ,CALDAT ,COST ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0711 WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}

INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZSDT1054H ( MANDT ,QTNUM ,QTSER ,PSPID ,CDATE ,CTIME ,CUSER ,UDATE ,UTIME ,UUSER ,FLAG ) SELECT MANDT ,CAST(#{smlqtnum} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS QTNUM ,QTSER ,PSPID ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS CDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS CTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS CUSER ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) AS UDATE ,HEX(CURRENT TIME) AS UTIME ,CAST(#{cuser} AS VARCHAR(30)) AS UUSER ,FLAG FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT1054H WHERE MANDT = #{mandt} AND QTNUM = #{qtnum} AND QTSER = #{qtser}
